content.title: Congenital Absence of IVC
content.description: Agenesis of inferior vena cava with azygos or hemiazygos continuation

key_concepts.details: Infrarenal IVC absent; blood returns via azygos/hemiazygos system to SVC
Often asymptomatic; may present with iliofemoral DVT in young patients
Present in 5-10% of young patients with unprovoked iliofemoral DVT
Critical to recognize preoperatively; affects IVC filter placement, renal surgery

content.clinical_significance: Consider in young patients with bilateral or recurrent DVT

primary_sources: Ruggeri M et al. Thromb Haemost 2001
